      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Variable Variable.copy()
      Returns a copy of the variable.
      static Variable[] Variable.newArray(int n)
      Returns an array of n variables with ids from 0 to n-1.
      Methods in core with parameters of type Variable 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Node> Problem.successors(Node<R> node, Variable var)
      Given a node and a variable, returns the list of nodes reached after having assigned the variable to every possible value.
